devdoc.details: This contract extends ZbyteContextDiamond and provides functionality related to royalty fees in Zbyte.

getRoyaltFeeInZbyte(address,address,byte.details: Retrieves the royalty fee in Zbyte for a specific DApp function.

params.functionSig_: The function signature of the DApp function.
params.payer_: The address of the entity paying the royalty fee.
params.user_: The address of the user involved in the DApp function.
params.zbyteCharge_: The Zbyte charge associated with the DApp function.

returns._0: uint256 The royalty fee in Zbyte.
returns._1: address The address of the payer.

devdoc.title: ZbyteDPlatRoyaltyFacet
